additionalAppointments.default: Dear customers, here you will find some additional dates in addition to the fixed opening hours.
additionalAppointments.help: The appointment name can be changed or removed entirely by clicking on the wrench icon.
additionalAppointments.info: You can use this text field to inform your customers about additional dates

error.end: The end of your calendar must be after its start date
error.time: The end of your opening time must be after its beginning

repeat.info: Appointments can be repeated daily, weekly or monthly using this function. The duplicate appointments can then be edited or deleted separately.
